nodes.text: The Hall of Assembly was a building constructed on Pijal to house the upcoming representative government. A spherical structure with a mirrored surface, the Hall of Assembly was designed to appear almost invisible until it was lit up by the setting of Pijal's sun. Nanotechnology was planted into the framework of the building, causing it to crumble to pieces. The act was falsely blamed on the Opposition, a political movement on the planet's moon.
